Humanizing Digital

Our Vision

Triplesense Reply

Digital agency since 1999

About us

Humanizing Digital is our Mission. Since 1999, we have been developing solutions centered around the perfect user experience.

Our team of Service Designers, UX Specialists, Front End Experts, Software Developers and Consultants work co-creatively and agilely. With enthusiasm, experience and an instinct for the essentials.

Excellent digital services in the areas of commerce, customer relations and communication. Measurable success for clients such as Vorwerk, eprimo and BMW. Creative engagement from the first idea all the way to technical operations.

As a part of the “Reply – Digital Experience“, we belong to the most successful digital agencies in Germany (first place in the BVDW Ranking 2021).

Karriere

Kreativ sein und freundlich denken

Account

Kundenversteher und Berater agieren bei uns als Moderatoren im Kreativprozess.

Festanstellung – ab sofort
Technical Account Manager / IT-Projektmanager (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
Senior Projektmanager (digital) (w/m/d)

Kreation

Von der Leitidee bis zum Pattern Lab: Unsere UX Designer liefern Inspiration.

Festanstellung – ab sofort
Senior User Experience Architect (w/m/d)

Technik

Systeme und Frameworks nach Maß: unsere Technik bringt Menschen voran.

Festanstellung – ab sofort
Solution Architect / Lead Developer (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
Technical Architekt – Adobe Experience Manager (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
DevOps Engineer (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
PHP Softwareentwickler Magento (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
Senior Frontend Developer (w/m/d)
Festanstellung – ab sofort
Frontend Developer (w/m/d)

Lust auf ein entspanntes Kaltgetränk zum Feierabend? Wir treffen uns gerne in unserem neuen, schönen Büro.

Klingt interessant? Dann melde dich einfach bei uns. Wir finden einen passenden Tag, gerne auch kurzfristig.

www.tagdesoffenenbiers.de

Initiativ­bewerbung

Gute Talente lernen wir auch gerne ohne Anzeige kennen. Womit überzeugst Du uns?
Vollzeit, Teilzeit? Erzähl uns, welches Arbeitsmodell für dich interessant ist!
Ja, ich denke, dass ich gut zu Triplesense Reply passe!
Marco Miraglia
Human Resources
+49(69) 9 99 99 37-0
 
 
Dan Fitzpatrick
Head of Technology
+49(69) 9 99 99 37-710

#JoinTheTeam!

Be creative and think “friendly”

Account

Customer focus Gurus and consultants are the moderators and conductors in our creative process.

Permanent position – from now on
Technical Account Manager (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
Senior Project manager (digital) (w/m/d)

Creation

From the initial vision to central idea to the pattern library: Our UX designers provide powerful, guided inspiration.

Permanent position – from now on
Enterprise Experience Architect (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
Senior User Experience Architect (w/m/d)

Development

Systems, applications and frameworks made to measure: our technology enables all actors in a digital ecosystem.

Permanent position – from now on
Solution Architect / Lead Developer (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
Technical Architekt – Adobe Experience Manager (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
PHP Software Developer Magento (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
Senior Frontend Developer (w/m/d)
Permanent position – from now on
Frontend Developer (w/m/d)

Would you like a relaxed cold drink after work? We like to meet in our new, beautiful office.

Sounds interesting? Then just get in touch with us. We will find a suitable day, even at short notice.

Open Beer Day! (DE)

Unsolicited application

We also like to get to know good talents who just walk through our door! Might you convince us?
Full-time, part-time? Tell us which working model is relevant for you!
Yeah, I think I’m a good match for Triplesense Reply!
Marco Miraglia
Human Resources
+49(69) 9 99 99 37-0

Humanizing Digital

Our Vision

Triplesense Reply

Digital agency since 1999

About us

Humanizing Digital is our Mission. Since 1999, we have been developing solutions centered around the perfect user experience.

Our team of Service Designers, UX Specialists, Front End Experts, Software Developers and Consultants work co-creatively and agilely. With enthusiasm, experience and an instinct for the essentials.

Excellent digital services in the areas of commerce, customer relations and communication. Measurable success for clients such as Vorwerk, eprimo and BMW. Creative engagement from the first idea all the way to technical operations.

As a part of the “Reply – Digital Experience“, we belong to the most successful digital agencies in Germany (first place in the BVDW Ranking 2021).
